hits.definition:
没 (F 沒)

[méi] (= 没有 méiyǒu) haven't, there isn't; 

    有没有 ? Yǒuméiyǒu? Is there or isn't there? Have (you) or haven't (you)?

[mò] sink, overflow, disappear, confiscate

还 (F 還)

[hái] still, yet

[huán] return, give back

发

[fā] (F 發) deliver, utter, express, shoot, emit, develop, expand

[fà] (F 髮) hair

[fa] (F 髮) 头发 tóufa hair

当

[dāng] (F 當) serve as, (F 噹) ding - dong

[dàng] (F 當) proper, right, equal, (= 当作 dàngzuò) treat as, regard as

想

[xiǎng] think, feel, consider, want, remember

看

[kàn] see, look at, read, think, consider

[kān] look after, tend; 

    看守 kānshǒu guard

无 (F 無)

[wú] without, nothingness, have not

[mó] 南无 nánmó <Sanskrit> to give oneself totally to

{Compare with 天 tiān heaven}
